sections.title: Welcome to muwatana
sections.description: Learn how to stay safe online, spot fake news, balance screen time, guide children in the digital world

items.title: Cybersecurity & Privacy
items.description: Stay safe online by learning practical tips to protect your personal information and avoid digital threats.

items.title: Parenting in the Digital Age
items.description: Discover how to identify fake news, navigate online content responsibly, and develop critical thinking skills for the digital age.

items.title: Digital Health
items.description: Promote well-being in the digital world by managing screen time, maintaining healthy online habits, and balancing technology use.

items.title: Media Literacy
items.description: Discover how to identify fake news, navigate online content responsibly, and develop critical thinking skills for the digital age.

sections.title: Digital Journeys
sections.description: Discuss and reflect on digital journeys with your spouse, children, and students.

sections.title: Discover Digital Citizenship
sections.description: In today's world, we all need the skill of a good digital citizenship to be safe and productive online. There are 9 digital citizenship principles.

items.title: Setting up 2-Factor Authentication
